text: He manisaharu! Hamile timiharu sabaila'i e'utai purusa ra e'uti stribata srsti garyaum ra timila'i jataviradari ra kabilaharu (gotraharu) ko rupa diyaum, taki timile eka arkala'i cinna saka. (Vastavama) allahakaham timimadhye sarvadhika pratisthita tyo ho jo ki timiharumadhye (anucita karmabata) badhi bhaya garnevala huncha. Niscaya nai allaha sabai kura jandacha, u sarvajna cha
